derivation.yuyuan_name: Italian, plural of salame, from a late Latin word meaning 'to salt'

entry.tran: 萨拉米香肠(味浓，多切片冷食)
entry.def: Salami is a type of strong-flavoured sausage. It is usually thinly sliced and eaten cold.

means.word_mean: 1. highly seasoned fatty sausage of pork and beef usually dried
